ThingDef.label: persona riot breaker
ThingDef.description: A charge rifle modified to be a magazine-fed fully automatic shotgun with recoil absorber. Packs a huge magazine and is extraordinarily powerful due to burst fire on short distance. Produced for maximum security Jailplanets with very dangerous subjects.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person.
